description: This file defines the AppointmentModel class for managing appointment data in a healthcare appointment management system. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting appointment records in the database.

classes.name: AppointmentModel
classes.description: Model class providing static methods to interact with the appointments data in the database.

methods.name: create({ patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_time, reason })
methods.description: Creates a new appointment record in the database with provided details and returns the created appointment.

methods.name: findById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves an appointment record by its unique identifier, including associated patient and doctor names.

methods.name: list({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Lists appointments filtered by optional parameters such as doctor ID, patient ID, date range, with pagination support.

methods.name: update(id, fields)
methods.description: Updates specified fields of an existing appointment identified by its ID.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes an appointment record by its ID.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^  static async create({ patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_time, reason }) {$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^  static async list({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {}) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {})
